DropDownList.h File Reference

Contains the DropDownList class, a control that displays a current selection, and allows the user to select one of several options from a list that drops down when the control is clicked. More...

class  GG::DropDownList
 displays a single choice, and allows the user to select items from a pop-up list. More...

Detailed Description

Contains the DropDownList class, a control that displays a current selection, and allows the user to select one of several options from a list that drops down when the control is clicked.
